question_text: Which of the following is NOT a connotation of the theory of special creation as described in the section?
options: Living organisms were created as such
The diversity of life has always remained the same
Living forms evolved gradually from common ancestors
correct_answer: Living forms evolved gradually from common ancestors
explanation: The first three options are the connotations of special creation. The idea that living forms evolved gradually from common ancestors contradicts the special creation theory.
topic: Evolution of Life Forms - A Theory
